metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40812 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The GD Graphics Library (aka LibGD) through 2.3.2 has an out-of-bounds read because of the lack of certain gdGetBuf and gdPutBuf return value checks.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> php uses the system libgd2 leosilva> the fix proposed is a partial one that address BMP and WebP but not GIF. no complete fix available from upstream as of 2021-11-08

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2021-11-08').
